txt.en: This home has been wrecked by Orcs, and no survivors remain within
Does Anyone Yet Live
Enemy flags can be found outside of the homes in Byre Tor.\n\nYou should destroy enemy flags and search the homes for survivors of the White Hand assault.
Orcs have planted their flags before the doors of Byre Tor homes as a trophy of their thorough efforts at pillaging, but perhaps some people have survived....
Enemy flags can be found outside of the homes in Byre Tor.\n\nYou should destroy Enemy flags and search the homes for survivors of the White Hand assault.
You have torn down the Enemy flags planted at the doors of the destroyed homes in Byre Tor.
You have investigated many homes in Byre Tor, but they are all empty.\n\nIt would appear that there are no survivors.
